document.full_text: authorities in the democratic republic of congo have arrested one of the masterminds of rwanda's 1994 genocide, a united nations court handling their cases said on wednesday.
document.title: top rwanda genocide suspect seized in congo: u.n. court
lines_and_colors: authorities in the democratic republic of congo have arrested one of the masterminds of rwanda's 1994 genocide, a united nations court handling their cases said on wednesday.
